mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user_login (user_id, username, full_name, token, action, result, ip_address, user_agent, login_time, created_at, status, noted, created_by) VALUES (#{userId}, #{username}, #{fullName}, #{token}, #{action}, #{result}, #{ipAddress}, #{userAgent}, #{loginTime}, #{createdAt}, #{status}, #{noted}, #{createdBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user_login SET action = #{action}, logout_time = #{logoutTime}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, username, full_name, token, action, result, ip_address, user_agent, login_time, logout_time, status, noted, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, is_deleted FROM sys_user_login WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
